Articles.Content:
Dear Abby style

Dear KSP,

I've seen in many KSP videos where a player is "panning" a camera left and right, rather than orbiting the CoM. I've been playing this game for a while now, and still don't know how to do it

Sincerely,

N00b on the Mun

You're right, that is a stupid question.

[/sarcasm]

Maybe they are on EVA. Can you provide us with an example?
Ahh I think I know what you mean, try holding down the middle mouse button and moving it, if there is another way to do this I haven't seen it yet.

Do you mean moving the camera around?

If so you right click and move the mouse about or use the arrow keys

Ahh I think I know what you mean, try holding down the middle mouse button and moving it, if there is another way to do this I haven't seen it yet.

Yes, that is what I was talking about Thanks!

LOL! I felt so stupid just asking that question. I've tried every key combo on the keyboard and mouse, EXCEPT the middle mouse button. Don't know why I overlooked that.
